class src.conf.config.Settings(_case_sensitive=None, _nested_model_default_partial_update=None, _env_prefix=None, _env_file=WindowsPath('.'), _env_file_encoding=None, _env_ignore_empty=None, _env_nested_delimiter=None, _env_parse_none_str=None, _env_parse_enums=None, _cli_prog_name=None, _cli_parse_args=None, _cli_settings_source=None, _cli_parse_none_str=None, _cli_hide_none_type=None, _cli_avoid_json=None, _cli_enforce_required=None, _cli_use_class_docs_for_groups=None, _cli_exit_on_error=None, _cli_prefix=None, _cli_flag_prefix_char=None, _cli_implicit_flags=None, _cli_ignore_unknown_args=None, _cli_kebab_case=None, _secrets_dir=None, *, DATABASE_URL='postgresql+asyncpg://admin:admin@localhost:5432/hw8', JWT_SECRET='YOUR_SECRET_KEY', JWT_ALGORITHM='HS256', JWT_EXPIRATION_SECONDS='3600', CLD_NAME='asdasdasd', CLD_API_KEY='156282568713174', CLD_API_SECRET='GREGFDGEREDSFWEF', MAIL_USERNAME='example@meta.ua', MAIL_PASSWORD='secretPassword', MAIL_FROM='example@meta.ua', MAIL_PORT=465, MAIL_SERVER='smtp.meta.ua', MAIL_FROM_NAME='Rest API Service', MAIL_STARTTLS=False, MAIL_SSL_TLS=True, USE_CREDENTIALS=True, VALIDATE_CERTS=True)[source]

Bases: BaseSettings

Configuration settings for the application.

This class loads environment variables and provides configurations such as database connection settings, JWT settings, cloud storage, and email server settings.

Parameters:

  • _case_sensitive (bool | None)

  • _nested_model_default_partial_update (bool | None)

CLD_API_KEY: int

Cloud storage API key.

CLD_API_SECRET: str

Cloud storage API secret key.

CLD_NAME: str

Cloud storage provider name.

DATABASE_URL: str

The database connection URL.

JWT_ALGORITHM: str

The algorithm used for signing JWT tokens.

JWT_EXPIRATION_SECONDS: str

The expiration time for JWT tokens in seconds.

JWT_SECRET: str

The secret key used for JWT authentication.

MAIL_FROM: EmailStr

The default sender email address.

MAIL_FROM_NAME: str

The display name of the email sender.

MAIL_PASSWORD: str

The password for the email server authentication.

MAIL_PORT: int

The port number for the email server.

MAIL_SERVER: str

The email SMTP server address.

MAIL_SSL_TLS: bool

Boolean flag indicating whether to use SSL/TLS encryption.

MAIL_STARTTLS: bool

Boolean flag indicating whether to use STARTTLS.

MAIL_USERNAME: EmailStr

The username for the email server authentication.

USE_CREDENTIALS: bool

Boolean flag indicating whether authentication credentials are required.

VALIDATE_CERTS: bool

Boolean flag indicating whether to validate SSL certificates.

model_config: ClassVar[SettingsConfigDict] = {'arbitrary_types_allowed': True, 'case_sensitive': False, 'cli_avoid_json': False, 'cli_enforce_required': False, 'cli_exit_on_error': True, 'cli_flag_prefix_char': '-', 'cli_hide_none_type': False, 'cli_ignore_unknown_args': False, 'cli_implicit_flags': False, 'cli_kebab_case': False, 'cli_parse_args': None, 'cli_parse_none_str': None, 'cli_prefix': '', 'cli_prog_name': None, 'cli_use_class_docs_for_groups': False, 'enable_decoding': True, 'env_file': None, 'env_file_encoding': None, 'env_ignore_empty': False, 'env_nested_delimiter': None, 'env_parse_enums': None, 'env_parse_none_str': None, 'env_prefix': '', 'extra': 'forbid', 'json_file': None, 'json_file_encoding': None, 'nested_model_default_partial_update': False, 'protected_namespaces': ('model_validate', 'model_dump', 'settings_customise_sources'), 'secrets_dir': None, 'toml_file': None, 'validate_default': True, 'yaml_file': None, 'yaml_file_encoding': None}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

src.conf.config.settings = Settings(DATABASE_URL='postgresql+asyncpg://admin:admin@localhost:5432/hw8', JWT_SECRET='YOUR_SECRET_KEY', JWT_ALGORITHM='HS256', JWT_EXPIRATION_SECONDS='3600', CLD_NAME='asdasdasd', CLD_API_KEY=156282568713174, CLD_API_SECRET='GREGFDGEREDSFWEF', MAIL_USERNAME='example@meta.ua', MAIL_PASSWORD='secretPassword', MAIL_FROM='example@meta.ua', MAIL_PORT=465, MAIL_SERVER='smtp.meta.ua', MAIL_FROM_NAME='Rest API Service', MAIL_STARTTLS=False, MAIL_SSL_TLS=True, USE_CREDENTIALS=True, VALIDATE_CERTS=True)

Global instance of the Settings class, automatically loading configurations from environment variables.
